Identification.LongTitle: United Nations Medal for Special Service Order

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: authorizes Canadians to accept and wear the United Nations Mission for the Verification of Human Rights and Compliance with the Comprehensive Agreement on Human Rights in Guatemala (MINUGUA) Medal in recognition of honourable service with the United Nations Mission in Guatemala; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: directs that that Medal follow the United Nations Mission in Haiti (UNMIH) Medal in the order of precedence in the Canadian Honours System.
